attributes.action: Allow the gaining and spending of points on stage 1 infant formulas
attributes.additional_details: Because infant formula is expensive. And while yes, breast feeding may be more beneficial to a newborn, it is not always an option. Single male parents, adoptive parents, women whom have had a mastectomy due to breast cancer, women with health conditions, women who’s babies had tongue ties when feeding started and got used to formula, women who couldn’t produce enough breast milk - all these people deserve the same respect and options as breast feeding women.
attributes.background: I would like for parents with bottle fed newborns to be able to earn and spend retail points on stage 1 infant formulas in all retailers

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign: 

Remove restrictions on promotional deals and discounts for baby formula
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/651210
